general_advisory: Harvest the matured paddy. If 80% of the panicles are matured, farmers can go for the harvesting. Reduce the moisture of the harvested paddy by sun drying it. Rodent- If ‘Rodent/Rats’ problem is noticed, locate the rodent burrow in the crop field and surrounding areas. Place Aluminium Phosphide 6% tablet @ One tablet (12 gm) per burrow and seal the burrow with mud which will kill the rodents.

advisory: Sowing of Rabi Pulses, Oilseeds & vegetables are going on.
Seed treatment is a must before sowing of rabi crops.
Seed treatment is a must before sowing of rabi crops.
To control leaf-eating caterpillar and fruit borer in winter vegetables like Brinjal, Cauliflower, Cabbage, Chilli & Tomato, apply 0.5 g Emamectin.
Farmers are advised to transplant 30-45 days old vegetable seedlings like Chilli, Tomato, Capsicum, Cabbage, Cauliflower, Brinjal, etc. in the main field.
Harvest the matured paddy. If 80% of the panicles are matured, farmers can go for the harvesting.
Reduce the moisture of the harvested paddy by sun drying it.
Right time to take up Paira crop which can be sown 15 days before harvesting of paddy.
There is a chance of powdery mildew disease in Black gram and Green gram. To control this disease, spray Sulphur 80% WP @ 800 g/acre or Hexaconazole 5% E.C @ 300 ml/acre.
There is a chance of powdery mildew disease in Black gram and Green gram. To control this disease, spray Sulphur 80% WP @ 800 g/acre or Hexaconazole 5% E.C @ 300 ml/acre.
Groundnut is in the sowing stage.
For controlling Red Rot disease in Sugarcane, spray Carbendazim 12%+ Mancozeb 63 % WP @ 400 g /acre or Metalaxyl 8 % + Mancozeb 64 % WP @ 400 g/acre.
There is a chance of downy mildew in Pointed gourd. To control downy mildew, spray Metalaxyl 8% + Mancozeb 64% W.P @ 400 g/acre or Fosetyl - AL 80 % WP @ 600 g/acre.
Cole crops are in the vegetative stage.
